insert into server_unit_services_parachute_flight (server_unit_services_parachute_flight_id, server_unit_services_id, server_unit_services_parachute_flight_address, server_unit_services_parachute_flight_aircraft_model, server_unit_services_parachute_flight_price) values (#{serverUnitServicesParachuteFlightId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serverUnitServicesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serverUnitServicesParachuteFlightAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverUnitServicesParachuteFlightAircraftModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverUnitServicesParachuteFlightPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
